permissionSets.description: Grants all permissions included in 'Agreements: Search & view agreements' plus the ability to search and view e-resources (packages and titles in those packages) in the internal KB.
Grants all permissions included in 'Agreements: Search & view e-resources' plus the ability to search and view platforms in the internal KB
Grants all permissions included in 'Platforms: Search & view platforms' plus the ability to edit platform properties
Grants all permissions included in 'Agreements: Search & view e-resources' plus the ability to edit the e-resources
A user with this permission can search and view existing agreements. This includes the permission to see and access the Agreement app in the Folio interface
A user with this permission is able to download and view the content of Agreement document files

Grants all permissions included in 'Agreements: Search & view agreements' plus the ability to edit agreements, including the ability to add and edit agreement lines, documents and view, add and edit tags on an agreement
Grants all permissions included in 'Agreements: Search & view agreements' plus the ability to delete agreements. This does not include the ability to edit agreements, only to delete them

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): Can view and edit settings

permissionSets.description: Grants permission to view the general Agreements settings

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): Can view and edit general settings
permissionSets.description: Grants permission to view and edit the general Agreements settings

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): View pick lists and values
permissionSets.description: Grants all permissions included in 'Settings (Agreements): Can view general settings' plus the ability to view pick lists and pick list values

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): Manage pick lists and values
permissionSets.description: Grants all permissions included in 'Settings (Agreements): Can view and edit general settings' plus the ability to manage pick lists and pick list values

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): Can view agreement supplementary properties
permissionSets.description: Grants all permissions included in 'Settings (Agreements): Can view general settings' plus the ability to view the available supplementary properties
Grants all permissions included in 'Settings (Agreements): Can view and edit general settings' plus the ability to manage the available supplementary properties
Grants permission to view the Agreements application settings

permissionSets.displayName: Settings (Agreements): Can view and edit app settings
permissionSets.description: Grants permission to view and edit the Agreements application settings
